UPDATE: A member of Reliance's PR team reached out to us to clarify that Beyonce won't be performing at Isha Amabani's wedding.
Keep your expectations higher than ever because it is the daughter of the richest man in India, Mukesh Ambani who is getting married soon. Isha Ambani is all set to tie the knot with Anand Piramal. A few months ago, the lavish engagement ceremony of the duo took place in Italy’s Lake Como, the same place where Deepika and Ranveer are rumoured to be tying the knot in Nov.
Twitter
All Bollywood biggies flew to Italy but what swept the entire nation off their feet was John Legend, who performed his all-time favourite track All Of Me for them.
The wedding is going to get bigger and better, and it's time you can sure expect the unexpected. Grapevine is abuzz with rumours that Beyonce will perform at the Sangeet ceremony of the duo. Yes, you read that right!
Twitter

“Isha is a big fan of American singer Beyoncé which is why Mukesh Ambani decided to have the pop star perform at the Sangeet ceremony. Both Anand and Isha are super excited to have the celebrated singer perform at their wedding. Some of Bollywood stars will also be doing a special performance at Isha’s cocktail in Udaipur,” Filmfare quoted a source as saying.
Isha Ambani and Anand Piramal’s festivities are scheduled to take place on December 8 and 9. The couple will tie the knot on December 10 in Udaipur. Well, if Beyonce arrives in India to perform for the Amabanis, it is going to be one heck of a night, don’t you think?
title: Blessings From Queen Bey? Isha Ambani's Wedding Will Have A Special Performance By Beyonce!
